sections.title: Guild Agent (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Guild Agent class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Trap Sense (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Grants a stacking bonus to AC and Reflex saves against traps that increases with level. This bonus stacks with trap sense from other classes.

sections.title: Trapfinding (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Functions as the rogue trapfinding ability, with Guild agent levels stacking with other classes for determining total trapfinding bonus. Allows detection and disabling of magical traps.

sections.title: Agency Secrets (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Special abilities gained every 2 levels starting at 2nd level, including options like bonus feats, rogue talents, spell-like abilities, and unique infiltration powers. Each secret can only be selected once unless specified otherwise.

sections.title: Mask Alignment (Su) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Allows altering alignment aura to deceive detection effects as a standard action, with improved versions allowing immediate action responses and full protection from alignment-based effects. At 10th level, the false alignment is treated as real for all magical effects.

sections.title: Ambush Trap (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Allows rigging of mechanical traps for remote triggering as a move action, adding trap sense and sneak attack bonuses to the trap's effectiveness. Requires exceeding the trap's Disable Device DC by 10.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Grants sneak attack damage starting at 1d6 and increasing to 3d6 by 9th level. Stacks with sneak attack bonuses from other sources.

sections.title: Crucial Taunt (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Provides a bonus to feint, demoralize, and dirty trick checks equal to half class level, with the ability to delay the effect for up to 1 day per level. Language-dependent and requires proximity to trigger.

sections.title: Improved Trap Sense (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Extends trap sense bonus to apply to all saving throws against trap effects, not just Reflex saves and AC.

sections.title: Remote Activation (Ex) (Guild Agent)
sections.description: Extends ambush trap ability to work on traps up to 30 feet away instead of requiring adjacency.
